example.parse: (S (CONJ ف) (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM نسبة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاجتهاد) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الصحافي))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS بقيت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADVP-LOC (ADV هنا)) (ADVP (ADV+CASE_INDEF_ACC ايضاً)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ضئيلة)) (NP-ADV (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مقارنة)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (PUNC ") (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN عادة) (PUNC ") (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ترداد) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاملاء) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاخباري))))))

arg.g: Compared to the "norm" of repeating the dictation

example.arg: مقارنة مع " عادة " ترداد الاملاء الاخباري
